featureSections.featuredesc: Tech Cloud ERP simplifies design management with a structured workflow that lets you upload, track and organize design jobs efficiently. From customer details and signage specifications to size, quantity and approvals, every detail is recorded in one place. This ensures accuracy, timely updates and full visibility across design transactions, enabling faster execution and improved collaboration.

A centralized module to manage all design-related requests and approvals, providing clear visibility into inquiries, customer details, signage specifications, dimensions, quantities and statuses. Users can search, filter and track progress with real-time updates, ensuring accuracy, timely responses and streamlined design approval workflows.

faqs.subTitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.title: Everything You Need to Know About Our CRM Solution

items.question: What is the purpose of the design module in ERP?
items.answer: The design module allows teams to upload, manage and review design files in a structured way. It helps centralize creative work, track changes and ensure designs to meet quality standards before moving to production.

items.question: Can I perform quality checks on uploaded designs?
items.answer: Yes, once a design is uploaded, teams can review it, mark any issues or corrections and add notes for reference. This helps to identify errors early and ensures designs are accurate and production-ready.

items.question: Is it possible to track design revisions and updates?
items.answer: Absolutely. Every update or correction is saved with version history, so you can track changes over time and ensure the latest design is always available to the right team.

items.question: What is the Design module in ERP?
items.answer: The Design module helps manage product blueprints, engineering drawings, version control and approvals in the ERP environment.
